details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Warrior to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the town Lith Harbor where Sugar has a quest called 'The Adventure Begins'. Accept the quest and choose the option 'Warrior' when prompted

Continue with the story until Lv. 30 as a Warrior and talk to Dances with Balrog to accept a quest called 'The 3 Ways of the Warrior'. Complete the quest by choosing the option Page and you will be on the path to a Paladin. Page is the 2nd job of Paladin

build: -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Blast - Reinforce and Extra Strike
  • Heaven's Hammer - Cooldown Cutter
  • Divine Charge - Reinforce and Extra Strike
Replace Divine Charge if you can 1-shot:
  • Heaven's Hammer - Reinforce and Extra Strike

nodeInfo.recommended:
Primary Trio
Secondary Trio
[ or ]
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Rorik and the Paladin Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build

extraContent.title: Vessel of Light
extraContent.content:
In 2nd Job, you unlock the passive, Vessel of Light, that provides a stacking buff each time a 'Holy Power' skill is used

Below are a list of all 'Holy Power' skills:

  • Divine Swing (2nd Job)
  • Divine Charge (3rd Job)
  • Divine Mark (4th Job)
  • Blast (4th Job)

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Echo of Hero
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest 'An Arrangement from the Goddess'
Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Slash Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 6, Damage: 335%, Max Enemies Hit: 6
primary.desc: Slash forward at multiple enemies

primary.name: War Leap
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, allows you to jump a greater distance
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Upward Charge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 304%.
primary.desc: Launch up into the air
details:
Can also be activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Attack Key together
  • Right-clicking the skill will lock it, preventing input activation

primary.name: Leap Attack
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, Damage: 90%, Number of Attacks: 2, Max Enemies Hit: 4
primary.desc: Dive downwards towards nearby platforms below
details: Can only be used while in the air
Use the Left or Right Arrow Keys to dive towards the given direction
Can also be activated by pressing the Down, Left, or Right Arrow Key and Attack Key together

primary.name: Iron Body
primary.shortDesc: DEF: +200, Max HP: +20%, Damage Taken: -10%

primary.name: Warrior Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Speed: 10, Jump: 10, Max Speed: 10, Max HP Per Level: 20, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Divine Swing
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 160%, Number of Attacks: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Stun Chance: 90%, Stun Duration: 6 sec.
primary.desc: Swing forward with a chance to stun enemies hit

primary.name: Vessel of Light
primary.shortDesc: Whenever you use a Holy Power skill, you will gain 1 Light Charge, that lasts 30 sec. You can hold up to 5 Light Charges at one time.\n[Effects Per Light Charge] Damage and HP Recovery: +2% (excludes healing from potions), Attack Power +8, Status Resistance +2, Damage Taken -2% (includes damage proportional to Max HP).
primary.desc: Using a Holy Power attacks will grant 1 Light Charge (up to 5)
details:
Each stack increases %Recovery amount, Abnormal Status Resistance, and %Damage Reduction and grants flat Attack
  • Damage Reduction also reduces %Max HP attacks

primary.name: Close Combat
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20. Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 125%, Number of Attacks: 2. 80% chance to stun enemies for 4 sec., and Speed -20 for 6 sec., after drawing them toward you.
primary.desc: Pulls in enemies from both sides of you with a chance to stun and slow enemies

primary.name: Agile Arms
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, STR: +20

primary.name: Knockback Resistance
primary.shortDesc: Knockback Resistance: +60%.

primary.name: Weapon Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Sword and Blunt Weapon Mastery: +50%, Attack Speed: +1

primary.name: Final Attack
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Skills] Grant a 40% chance to deal 80% Final Attack damage 2 time(s).
primary.desc: Grants your attacks a chance to deal an additional hit

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increase STR by 30 and DEX by 30.

primary.name: Divine Charge
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35. Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 310%, Number of Attacks: 4, Silence Chance: 100%, Silence Duration: 10 sec.
primary.desc: Slam forward while silencing enemies hit

primary.name: HP Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40. Instantly recovers 50% of Max HP. If used repeatedly within 15 sec, recovery amount decreases by 10%, Minimum HP recovery amount 10%
details: Recovers less HP when used repeatedly

primary.name: Rush
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Damage: 305%, Max Enemies Pushed: 12
primary.desc: Dash forward while pushing enemies back
details: While dashing, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Noble Demand
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Success Rate: 100%, Duration: 80 sec. Max Number of Enemies: 6, Enemy Attack and Defense: -50%, Accuracy: -50%, Duration (Accuracy): 8 sec.
primary.desc: Debuffs nearby enemies by reducing their %Attack, %DEF and %Accuracy
details: Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Parashock Guard
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 32, When nearby party members are hit (except yourself): Damage -20% and Guard Chance +20% , your Attack Power +20
primary.desc: While active, grants flat Attack for self and a buff to nearby party members when they are hit (except yourself)
details: [Buff]: Party members gain increased %Damage Reduction (against regular monsters) and a chance to guard themselves

primary.name: Combat Orders
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 36, All Skills: +2 Levels, Duration: 200 sec.
primary.desc: Temporarily grants bonus skill levels to skills for all party members
details: 4th Job Skills can be raised past their Master Level
[Exception]: Beginner skills, Combat Orders, Hyper Skills and 5th Job Skills

primary.name: Shield Mastery
primary.shortDesc: When shield or rosary is equipped - Abnormal Status Resistance: +40, Elemental Resistance: +40%, Defense: +250%, Attack Power: +10, Guard Chance: 40%, Stun Chance on Guard: 60%

primary.name: Achilles
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -30%

primary.name: Divine Shield
primary.shortDesc: Shield Chance (when hit): 100%, For 90 sec, Attack Power: +20, Enemy Blows Blocked: 10, Damage -25% only for attacks that inflict damage at a certain ratio of the max HP,\nUnable to recreate Protective Shield for 30 sec once activated.
primary.desc: Creates a shield when hit that absorbs attacks and increases your Attack
details: For attacks that deal %Max HP damage, reduces amount taken by a percentage
Right-clicking the skill will toggle the visual effect on/off

primary.name: Divine Mark
primary.shortDesc: Divine Mark MP Cost: 55. Cooldown: 7 sec. Max Enemies Hit: 10. Damage: 420%. Number of Attacks: 7. Leaves behind a divine brand of light at the target location, which explodes after a set duration, with a 100% chance to silence enemies for 10 sec.\nDivine Mark Explosion: Deals 290% damage 5 times to up to 10 enemies. Deals 30% additional damage to normal enemies.\n[Passive Effects: Divine Charge +100%p, Increases Range]
primary.desc: Periodically enhances the next to trigger a special attack that explodes shortly after
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %p Damage and range of
Party members affected by can trigger the special attack however it will not explode
Explosion deals increased %Damage to regular monsters
Enemies hit are silenced

primary.name: Blast
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 24, Damage: 305%, Number of Attacks: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 3
primary.desc: Strike forward dealing a powerful blow

primary.name: Divine Judgment
primary.shortDesc: Each time an enemy is struck by your Blast skill, they receive a stack of Divine Brand.\nDivine Brand Max Duration: 30 sec. When Divine Brand stacks 5 times, an explosion deals 550% damage 10 times to up to 1 enemies. Explosion damage receives Ignore Defense +20%.
primary.desc: Enemies hit with receive a stacking debuff (up to 5 times)
details: Party members affected by will not grant additional stacks
Upon reaching 5 stacks, the debuff is consumed and deals damage to the enemy
The attack has increased %Ignore DEF

primary.name: Magic Crash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, 100% chance to remove enemies' buffs. Buff Block Duration: 22 sec\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Removes buffs on nearby enemies and prevents them from casting new buffs
details: Enemies affected by Magic Crash cannot be affected again for a short period

primary.name: Heaven's Hammer
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Damage: 620%, Number of Attacks: 8, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Boss Damage: +30%\nCooldown: 15 sec.
primary.desc: Slams a hammer damaging nearby enemies in a large area
details: While casting, you will not be knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
Deals increased %Damage towards bosses

primary.name: Divine Blessing
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Final Damage: +20%, Duration: 200 sec.

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by Combat Orders

primary.name: Guardian
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 50 MP to revive your closest party member, then grant both of you invincibility for 10 sec.\nCooldown: 600 sec
primary.desc: Revives one party member closest to you and grants both of you invincibility for a short time
details: Consumes a Death Count for bosses but buffs are kept

primary.name: High Paladin
primary.shortDesc:
Mastery: +70%, DEF: +400, Critical Rate: +40%, Critical Damage: +15%, DEF Ignored: +30%, Final Damage: +40%
Critical Damage +6% and Mastery +3% when equipped with a One-Handed Sword
Critical Damage +5% when equipped with a Two-Handed Sword
Critical Damage +5%, DEF Ignored +10%, and Mastery +3% when equipped with a One-Handed Blunt weapon
Critical Damage +5% and DEF Ignored +10% when equipped with a Two-Handed Blunt weapon
primary.desc: Increases %Weapon Mastery, %Crit Rate, %Crit Damage, %Ignore DEF, and %Final Damage and grants flat DEF
details: Depending on the weapon equipped, gain additional %Critical Damage, %Ignore DEF and %Weapon Mastery

primary.name: Greater Vessel of Light
primary.shortDesc: Increases Divine Charge's max number of targets by 2. Increases Attack Count of Blast and Divine Charge by +1.\n[Effects Per Light Charge] Damage and HP Recovery +5% (excludes healing from potions), Attack Power: +12, Status Resistance +2, Damage Taken -2% (includes damage proportional to Max HP).
details: Increases %Damage and HP Recovery and Attack provided from each stack of Light Charge
Additionally, permanently increases the max number of enemies hit by and the number of attacks of and

hyperActive.name: Sacrosanctity
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 600, Invincibility Duration: 30 sec. When the skill ends, its cooldown is reduced by 45 sec. for every 5 sec. of remaining duration.\nCooldown: 300 sec
details:
Pressing the Skill Key again will end the buff early
  • The cooldown is reduced depending on the remaining duration

hyperActive.name: Smite Shield
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 400, Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 500%, Number of Attacks: 6, Stun Duration: 10 sec.\nStun Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Smite Shield.\nCooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: Binds nearby enemies and removes buffs to enemies hit

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Explorer class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Divine Echo
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: MP 1000, Duration: 42 sec., Final Damage: +72%\nEchoing Party Member - Upon using an offensive skill, the affected party member mimics you for 37% of Final Damage. Buff Duration on Party Member: 62% + 1% for every 1000 Strength (up to 100%)\nCooldown: 90 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Targets a party member in range who will duplicate any attack skills and certain buffs you use
details: Increases %Final Damage while buff is active

Buffs gained from Divine Echo on party member have a shorter duration
  • The duration is based on a fixed amount + 1% for every 1000 STR up to 100%
Pressing the Down Arrow Key along with the Skill Key while the skill is active, you can select a party member to echo by pressing the corresponding number key (with regard to the party UI)

fifthMain.name: Hammers of the Righteous
fifthMain.shortDesc:
[Passive Effects] Creates 1 spiraling hammer around you whenever you generate a Light Charge. Up to 5 hammers can be active at once, and their duration is shared with Vessel of Light.

[Active Effects] MP Cost: 1000. Hammers automatically attack up to 8 enemies 4 times dealing 1050% damage over 30 sec. Attack speed increases with the number of hammers.
Cooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Passively creates hammers whenever you gain a Light Charge (up to 5 hammers)
details: [Active]: Causes the hammers to grow and damage enemies around you and will gain attack speed based on the number of hammers active
While active, pressing the Skill Key again will end the attack early
Duration of the hammers is shared with
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Grand Guardian
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Consumes 2% of max HP per sec. Deals 595% damage 12 times consecutively on up to 12 enemies while holding the key down.
After some time passes, the cross gets bigger, which will increase attack speed and deal 1040% damage.
Max Key-down Time: 6 sec, Additional Critical Rate: +100%, Additional Monster DEF Ignored: +100%
Damage Reduction During Key-down: 50% (including Percentage HP attacks)
Cooldown: 180 sec.
fifthMain.desc: While held, consumes %Max HP to create a cross that deals damage and slowly expands and will increase in attack speed and damage
details: While casting, increases %Damage Reduction (including %Max HP attacks)
You can move while casting and will not be knocked back or stunned by enemies
Attack has 100% Ignore DEF and is a guaranteed Critical Hit

fifthMain.name: Mighty Mjolnir
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500, sets 1 enemy as the target and deals 400% damage 6 time(s). Additional Critical Rate: 50%. Tracks down a total of 4 enemies as targets, including the first attack.
A shockwave occurs after attacking the tracked target, dealing additional attacks up to 6 enemies, with 450% damage, 9 time(s).
1 Hammer will be prepared every 12 sec, and you can hold up to 3.
Cooldown: 2.5 sec
fifthMain.desc: Throws a mighty hammer that travels towards enemies while targeting the enemy with the highest Max HP
details: The hammer has increased %Crit Chance and creates a shockwave when it hits a target that damages nearby enemies
You can control the direction of where the hammer is thrown by pressing the Skill Key and any Arrow Key
You gain 1 hammer every 12 secs (up to 3 at a time)
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

masteryCore.name: HEXA Blast
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 465%, Number of Attacks: 10

masteryCore.name: HEXA Divine Judgment
masteryCore.shortDesc: Each time an enemy is struck by your Blast skill, they receive a stack of Divine Brand.\nDivine Brand Max Duration: 30 sec. When Divine Brand stacks 5 times, an explosion deals 890% damage 10 times to up to 1 enemies. Explosion damage receives Ignore Defense +20%.

originSkill.name: Sacred Bastion
originSkill.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting
Shock Wave that attacks up to 15 enemies with 3600% damage 7 times is triggered 7 times, then Shock Wave that attacks with 3300% damage 12 times is triggered 5 times.
Creates a sanctuary for 30 seconds, activates Light of Judgment to attack up to 5 enemies with 1800% damage 6 times when Paladin attacks within the sanctuary, Light of Judgment marks Divine Brand on enemies, Cooldown: 0.5 seconds
Skill Cooldown: 360 seconds

meta: Paladin is a STR warrior class part of the Explorers. Paladin utilize both One-Handed and Two-Handed Swords and Blunt Weapons as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Paladin can equip Rosaries and Shields
